lead_paragraph: Defying criticism of his country’s bloody war on drugs, the Philippine president escalated his provocative rhetoric with a reference to the Holocaust.

headline.print_headline: ‘I’d Be Happy to Slaughter’ 3 Million Addicts, Philippine Leader Says
headline.main: Duterte, Citing Hitler, Says He Wants to Kill 3 Million Addicts in Philippines

snippet: Defying criticism of his country’s bloody war on drugs, the Philippine president escalated his provocative rhetoric with a reference to the Holocaust....
abstract: Pres Rodrigo Duterte of Philippines declares he would be happy to kill country's three million drug addicts, defending his violent crackdown on narcotics and defying international criticism; draws additional censure by making reference to extermination of Jews during Holocaust.
